items.content_html: A minimalistic demonstration of virtual DOM concepts implemented in plain JavaScript. This project features a simple application that manages a dynamic list of emojis with manual state management. It showcases how to efficiently update the user interface using a virtual DOM diffing algorithm.
items.title: Shaban-Eissa/lightweight-virtual-dom: A minimalistic demonstration of virtual DOM concepts implemented in plain JavaScript. This project features a simple application that manages a dynamic list of emojis with manual state management. It showcases how to efficiently update the user interface using a virtual DOM diffing algorithm.
